title: Indian hotel industry revenue expected to grow 7-9 pc in FY25: ICRA
description: The Indian hotel industry is expected to grow 7-9% with high occupancy in FY2025. Demand from domestic leisure travel, MICE, weddings, business travel, spiritual tourism, tier-II cities, and domestic tourism will drive growth. FTA recovery depends on the global macroeconomic environment and consumer sentiments.
